move.name: Weather Ball
move.description: Base Power doubles and changes type based on the weather.

move.name: Whirlpool
move.description: Traps and damages the target for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Whirlwind
move.description: Forces a switch to a random Pokemon. Priority -6.

move.name: Wide Guard
move.description: Protects the user and its allies from multi-target attacks. Chance of failure increases if it, Detect, Protect, Endure, Quick Guard, King's Shield, or Spiky Shield was used successfully the previous turn. Priority +3.

move.name: Wild Charge
move.description: Has 1/4 recoil.

move.name: Will-O-Wisp
move.description: Burns the target.

move.name: Wing Attack
move.description: No additional effect.

move.name: Wish
move.description: Heals 50% of the user's max HP after two turns. Can heal an ally in the user's place.

move.name: Withdraw
move.description: Boosts the user's Defense by one stage.

move.name: Wonder Room
move.description: Swaps the Defense and Special Defense of all Pokemon, ignoring stat changes.

move.name: Wood Hammer
move.description: Has 1/3 recoil.

move.name: Work Up
move.description: Boosts the user's Attack and Special Attack by one stage each.

move.name: Worry Seed
move.description: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.

move.name: Wrap
move.description: Deals damage to the target at the end of every turn for two to five turns.

move.name: Wring Out
move.description: Base Power depends on the target's remaining HP.

move.name: X-Scissor
move.description: No additional effect.

move.name: Yawn
move.description: Puts the target to sleep after two turns.

move.name: Zap Cannon
move.description: Paralyzes the target.

move.name: Zen Headbutt
move.description: 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.
